name: Cranberry Salad

ingredients.name: c. pineapple juice (drained from crushed pineapple)

instructions: Mix hot water with gelatin and stir thoroughly. Add pineapple juice and cool. Pour sugar over ground cranberries. Let stand while gelatin is cooling. When gelatin starts to thicken, add cranberries, pineapple, celery and nuts. Place in mold and chill.
